channel.title: Event-articles on Seasalt.ai's SeaSuite Powers Contact Centers of the Future.
channel.description: Recent content in Event-articles on Seasalt.ai's SeaSuite Powers Contact Centers of the Future.

item.title: Voice Intelligence for Better Workforce Management and Customer Insights - August 11, 2022
item.description: Contact centers accumulate massive amounts of voice data through all the customer conversations they have every single day.

item.title: 跟Seasalt.ai出海系列第三期 - SeaX工单系统及自动化 2022年7月7日
item.description: → ZenDesk / HubSpot / Salesforce看花眼，出海企业如何选择工单系统？ → 客户反复来电，就是不满意。如何快速关单，并提高客户满意度CSAT？ → 工单自动化，省去客服手动操作，高效少出错，看看客服中心如何实现工单流程自动化。

item.title: SeaX Contact Center Case Management - July 7, 2022
item.description: Call center case management and support tickets are the backbone of organized and efficient customer support.

item.title: 跟Seasalt.ai出海系列第二期 - 如何招聘及运营海外客服 2022年6月2日
item.description: 了解如何招聘及运营海外客服。Join us on Thursday, June 2, 2022 at 10AM Beijing Time for our next webinar!

item.title: SeaX Contact Center Solutions and AI Intelligent Knowledge Base - June 2, 2022
item.description: Efficiency and accuracy are hallmarks of great customer support and call center workflows.

item.title: 跟Seasalt.ai出海系列第一期 - SeaX 东亚出海企业呼叫中心解决方案 2022年4月28日
item.description: 隆重推出一站式海外云端呼叫中心解决方案SeaX。Join us on Thursday, April 28, 2022 at 10AM Beijing Time for our next webinar!
